roleset.name: rotund
roleset.note: CHUBBY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from chubby.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: That 's the only place i see a lot of familiar faces , but it 's all awkward small talk . I avoid it . a lot of the cool kids got chubby ... that 's kind of funny .
example.arg: a lot of the cool kids
